---
title: Getting Started
description: Quick start guide for GAIK toolkit
---

## Installation

Install GAIK toolkit using pip. The package supports Python 3.11+.

```bash
# All features
pip install gaik[all]

# Or install specific components
pip install gaik[parser]      # PDF parsing only
pip install gaik[transcriber] # Audio transcription only
```

## Environment Setup

Set up your API keys as environment variables:

### Azure OpenAI (Recommended)

```bash
export AZURE_API_KEY="your-api-key"
export AZURE_ENDPOINT="https://your-endpoint.openai.azure.com/"
export AZURE_API_VERSION="2025-03-01-preview"  # Optional
```

### Standard OpenAI

```bash
export OPENAI_API_KEY="sk-..."
```

## Quick Start

Here's a simple example to get you started with GAIK:

```python
from gaik.software_components.extractor import (
    SchemaGenerator, DataExtractor, get_openai_config
)

# Configure OpenAI (Azure or standard)
config = get_openai_config(use_azure=True)  # or use_azure=False

# Step 1: Generate schema from requirements
generator = SchemaGenerator(config=config)
schema = generator.generate_schema(
    user_requirements="Extract name and age from text"
)

# Step 2: Extract data
extractor = DataExtractor(config=config)
results = extractor.extract(
    extraction_model=schema,
    requirements=generator.item_requirements,
    user_requirements="Extract name and age from text",
    documents=["Alice is 25 years old"]
)

print(results)  # [{'name': 'Alice', 'age': 25}]
```

## End-to-End Document Pipeline

For a simpler high-level API, use the software components:

```python
from gaik.software_modules.documents_to_structured_data import (
    DocumentsToStructuredData
)
from pathlib import Path

# Create pipeline
pipeline = DocumentsToStructuredData(use_azure=True)

# Process document
result = pipeline.run(
    file_path=Path("invoice.pdf"),
    user_requirements="""
    Extract invoice information:
    - invoice_number: Invoice ID
    - vendor: Company name
    - total_amount: Total in EUR (decimal)
    - date: Invoice date
    """,
    parser_choice="vision_parser",  # or "pymupdf", "docling", "docx"
)

print(result.extracted_fields)
```

## Parse PDF to Markdown

```python
from gaik.software_components.parsers import VisionParser, get_openai_config

# Configure and parse
config = get_openai_config(use_azure=True)
parser = VisionParser(openai_config=config)

pages = parser.convert_pdf("document.pdf")
markdown = "\n\n".join(pages)
print(markdown)
```

## Audio Transcription

```python
from gaik.software_components.transcriber import Transcriber, get_openai_config

config = get_openai_config(use_azure=True)
transcriber = Transcriber(
    api_config=config,
    output_dir="transcripts/",
    enhanced_transcript=True  # Optional GPT enhancement
)

result = transcriber.transcribe("meeting.mp3")
print(result.raw_transcript)
```
